detail_desc: Brazilian briefs in jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Dungarees in sweatshirt fabric made from soft organic cotton. Straps with press-studs, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a V-neck and drawstring at the front. Short, flounced sleeves and a flounced hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.

Short-legged romper suit in soft, double-weave organic cotton with short sleeves and a wrapover front with ties and press-studs at the sides. Press-studs at the crotch and narrow, covered elastication at the hems.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Blouse in an airy weave with a deep V-neck, decorative buttons down the front, long puff sleeves and cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a gently flared peplum.
Multi-strand bracelet in imitation leather with a magnetic metal fastener.
Joggers in soft velour with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Small shoulder bag in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a handle at the top. Narrow, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle and carabiner hook at the ends that can be attached to the handle. Flap with a metal clasp. One small inner compartment. Lined. Size 7x13x18.5 cm.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with a racer back that has a crocheted section in the shape of a butterfly at the top. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button, and a frayed, raw-edge hem.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Court shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Scarf in a soft wool weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 32x180 cm.
Sleeveless top in a crêpe weave with pleats at the top, a V-neck at the back with an opening and ties at the back of the neck, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Jersey lining.

Calf-length boiler suit in soft viscose twill with a round neck, buttons to the waist, a yoke at the back and a small chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, patch front pockets and wide, gently tapered legs.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Longer V-neck jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in a patterned weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and low crotch. Side pockets, fake back pockets, and straight legs with creases.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist and skinny legs.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a boat neck.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with wide foldover ribbing around the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Push-up bras in soft cotton jersey and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Earrings and ear cuffs in metal. Five hoop earrings. Eight ear cuffs.

Short, straight-cut shirt dress in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short jersey top with a round neckline, short sleeves and an open back with ties at the hem.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Super skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist. Lined.
Blouse in a patterned cotton weave with a round neckline, small opening and button at the back of the neck and short, elasticated puff sleeves.

Sports joggers in heavy jersey with taped details. Elasticated, drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for added mobility and wide ribbing at the hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.

Shirt in easy-iron premium cotton with a cut-away collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the narrow cuffs and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, boat neck, long sleeves and elastication at the sides. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a cotton blend with a cable-knit front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Earrings in coloured metal with a faceted plastic stone. Size approx. 4.5 cm
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, one back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Leather trainers with a patent finish, lightly padded top edge and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Mesh linings, cotton twill insoles and rubber soles.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.

Microfibre T-shirt bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and no visible seams for better comfort.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, ties at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Warm-lined biker boots with a zip in one side and a decorative tab with a metal buckle at the front. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on the shoulder and at the crotch.
Calf-length, heavily draping skirt in chiffon with fringes made from plastic beads. High, grosgrain waistband and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a soft brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, two chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
A-line dress in plumeti cotton with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, concealed pockets in the side seams and short cap sleeves with double, flared flounces. Unlined.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Round-necked blouse in an airy crinkled weave with short, flounced sleeves. Opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and a gathered yoke at the front.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 6 cm.
Vest top in patterned cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Short-sleeved nursing top in soft viscose jersey with a double-layered, wrapover front for easier nursing access.

Dress in mesh with sequined embroidery, pin-tucks at the top, buttons at the back and short butterfly sleeves. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt in a double layer of tulle. Satin lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with half-length puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Elastic hairband with flower appliqués.
Short jumper in a soft, patterned knit with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Relaxed fit.

Push-up bra in lace and microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Paper bag trousers in woven fabric with a decorative, studded belt at the waist, pleats at the top and wide, tapered legs.

Coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Discreet side pockets and a single back vent. Satin lining. The polyester content of the coat’s lining is partly recycled.
Top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Gathers in the sides for best fit.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waist, fake fly, front and back pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with an open chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Straight-cut shirt dress in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pockets with a pleat. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Microfibre bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit with a motif on the front.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a fake fly, fake welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with creases. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Long metal earrings with faceted sparkly stones. Length approx. 11 cm.
Moccasins in a fine-knit cotton blend and imitation leather with soft terry inside and soft suede soles.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Flounce at the top and smocking at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and on the double-layered sleeves.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and wide elastication at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch twill with a regular waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lightly padded cups with removable inserts, double adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless. Light support.
